### April 25, 2025

**RobinCar2 R Package Released on CRAN**

The [RobinCar2](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RobinCar2/index.html) R package (ROBust INference for Covariate Adjustment in Randomized Clinical Trials) has officially launched on CRAN. RobinCar2 is a streamlined version of the [RobinCar](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RobinCar/index.html) package, specifically targeting generalized linear models. With minimal dependencies and rigorous validation, RobinCar2 is especially suitable for GxP-compliant applications. Additional details, documentation, and vignettes can be found on the [Openpharma RobinCar2](https://openpharma.github.io/RobinCar2/main/) site.
